About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

I am a political research analyst, currently residing in the city of Chicago and pursuing a career in Web-Development. My current skill set include HTML, CSS, Java Script, Bootstrap, Jquery, Node and React. I love spending my time outdoors hiking and doing photography. During the brutal Chicago winters i like to stay indoors and spend my time painting. I have a keen eye for aesthetics and would love to channel that into building clean and beautiful user interfaces!
